content: i have had several people ask about these patterns and while i don t have them available on my website anymore they are available via the wayback machine disclaimer i wrote the pattern not long after i first started crocheting and i feel that it is not a good pattern i took the pattern down because i don t have the time to rework it and i didn t want people wasting their time on it that said if you use the wayback machine on my website creativeblythe com you should be able to find an archived copy of the pattern please keep in mind that i was really green when i wrote it
